item.title: JavaScript Rising Stars 2017
item.description: In 2016 Create React Appsolved the problem of how to start coding a React application by providing a nice set of presets, very well packaged. Facebook keeps releasing new versions very often and it was by far the most popular project in 2017 among the React ecosystem. Vue Ecosystem Elementand iVieware the two most popular UI component kits, both focused on rapid desktop UI development.
